actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to remove all limitations on the aggregate period for which a person may receive assistance under two or more of the veterans' educational assistance laws.

summary.text: Removes all limitations on the aggregate period for which a person may receive assistance under two or more of the veterans' education assistance laws. (Repeals 38USC. l795)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to remove all limitations on the aggregate period for which a person may receive assistance under two or more of the veterans' educational assistance laws.
